inputs.name: LDAP Server Hostname
inputs.help_text: Enter the hostname of the LDAP server.

inputs.name: LDAP Server User Filter
inputs.help_text: Specify the user filter for LDAP queries.

actions.description: Fetches attributes from the configured LDAP server based on device attributes.
actions.trigger: When the LDAP server is configured and a query is initiated.

constraints.constraint: LDAP Server must be configured with a valid hostname or user filter.

errors.description: Occurs when the LDAP server configuration is invalid or incomplete.
errors.resolution: Ensure the hostname and user filter are correctly configured.
